TopicTitle: PS4 have KSP Enhanced, can I delete old version?

Articles.Content: Perhaps a silly question, I've been playing the Enhanced version of KSP for PS4, can I delete the old version of KSP from my playstation?
Yes u can, and still be able to play enhanced edition.
Yes. It is a new port created as a new separated game. You can also delete the saves from the old versions. Enhanced edition is not a patch. These two versions are not connected in any way.
